title: Looking For Season 5 Ranked Team (Restricted 20yrs+ NZ/AUS)
body:
Must have over 1000 Normal Wins
Must have Runes and experience with every Role
Prefer If you have had experience with games like HON, and Dota before coming to LoL. Would also like it if you have been here since Season 1. But not essential
Must be 20yrs old or over, No exceptions
Must be NZ or Aus or willing to be on at time that suit those location
Mic Not required but might be later on.

This is for the Old Dota.v1 Frozen Throne Addicts :P

Ello Hell does exist

replies.body: over 20 year old, here since season 1, and played dota/hon, please go back to your hole you neckbeard.
OCE community ....  Nothing positive to say. Ever. Piss off troll boy
I just don't get why 1000+ normal wins necessary at all lmao

Because it means they have experience. 

Are you even 20yrs or +? or you just another troll adding his worthless 2 cents?

Most players are at their pick form at 18-20, so your %%%%ed if you get 20+ m8 btw I have over 1000 ranked games, and dota 2 is %%%% because I don't like it, and everyone who plays dota has never played league and when they compared the 2 league always been number 1
Why did you even comment? lol troll much?
If you wanna troll me, Add me. Ill 1v1 you. After all this is a LoL forum
